summary: THE CONSUMER NOTICED RUST AROUND THE ENGINE.  THE VEHICLE WAS SERVICE AND THE TECHNICIAN NOTICED THAT THE STRUT TOWER WAS RUSTED.   *NLM  THE CONSUMER NOTICED RUST AROUND THE ENGINE.
